snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [205] Stargate
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by MadMatty

I saw the recent Sega16 review of this game and wanted to play it.  Whats starts of as a fun normalish platformer soon turns into repetative as the game varies very little throughout.  The difficulty level is abit insain at times (my fault for playing on hard?)

I get abit lost in parts as I look for all the Symbols and Nuclear weapon parts.  But I do get them all to unlock best ending.  And for all the effort, a 2 screen end.  Probe did a lousy job porting the snes version it seems, pretty much cutting the ending off. 

 Im sure they could have found a way to have some kind of Deathglider battle without requiring the snes mode 7.  a sideways shoting bit would have been enough.  While the game has its good parts, i was dissapointed in the end and would recommend anyone wanting to play it to play on the snes instead if only for a more complete game.

While the music is ok, it doesnt vary much throughout the game and sounds nothing like stargate. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
